channel.title: Crafting on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Crafting on John Cosio

item.title: So many games so little time: Crashlands
item.description: Hey there! Just finished Crashlands. I really enjoyed every session and lost some sleep. Just one more recipeee!!! Crashlands was released in 2016, I was pretty late for the party but no worries still got to play it. It went on sale some time ago on Steam and Google play so I went with the Android version since I thought I might be able to play that more often(Also cheaper).
